title: Single Pole Decorator Light Switch, 15A 120/277V, Paddle Rocker, On/Off Wall Switch, Residential Grade, White, UL/CUL Certified (2-Pack)

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #116,004 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #365 in Electrical Light Switches       #365 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
availability_status: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Wide Voltage Compatibility：Supports a voltage range of 120V-277V, 15Amp, making it suitable for various electrical systems. It ensures stable and reliable performance in both residential and commercial settings

Durable Construction：Made from high-quality materials, this switch is durable and resistant to aging. The single-pole toggle switch is easy to operate and has a long lifespan, capable of withstanding frequent use
Easy Installation：Designed for easy installation with clear instructions provided. Even non-professionals can install it effortlessly, saving time and effort
Versatile Applications：Ideal for a wide range of applications, including residential and commercial settings. It can be used for lighting, small appliances, and commercial equipment control
UL Certified Safety：This switch is UL certified, meeting the stringent safety standards in the US. The white color offers a sleek and versatile look that matches any decor style

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are nothing fancy - but that's not a bad thing. They're solidly made and not flimsy, and have a good "click" as they switch.There are both screws and push-in connections on the back. Some cheaper switches are missing one or the other, so it's a nice thing that these have both.They use standard screws and decora plates, and so far everything fits well.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These work well as light switches. Easy to install and works as expected.
